entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
